content.question: The graph of the function <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is shown in the figure above. skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
